# b2b-progress-bar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                                     | Type                | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ----------- |
| `label`         | `label`          | The label of the progress bar.                                                  | `string`            | `undefined` |
| `labelPosition` | `label-position` | Whether the label should be displayed on the right or left of the progress bar. | `"left" \| "right"` | `'left'`    |
| `labelType`     | `label-type`     | Whether the label should be displayed below or on the side of the progress bar. | `"below" \| "side"` | `'below'`   |
| `progress`      | `progress`       | The percentage of progress from 0 to 100.                                       | `number`            | `undefined` |
